com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.scheduler
Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.scheduler.Scheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class Scheduler
extends Object
implements PropertyChangeListener

An interval based scheduler service Used to execute various tasks at the predefined interval There is supposed to be only one instance of this class accesible vie getSharedInstance()

Author:
Jaroslav Bachorik

Method Summary
 void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
           
 ScheduledTask schedule(SchedulerTask task, Quantum interval)
          Schedules a new task to be executed with the given interval The newly scheduled task is exeucted out-of-order at the moment of scheduling it This operation's result should be cached by the caller;otherwise the task will get unscheduled immediately
 ScheduledTask schedule(SchedulerTask task, Quantum interval, boolean immediate)
          Schedules a new task to be executed with the given interval This operation's result should be cached by the caller;otherwise the task will get unscheduled immediately

 void unschedule(ScheduledTask task)

Method Detail

sharedInstance

public static final Scheduler sharedInstance()
Singleton accessor

Returns:
Returns the shared instance of scheduler service

schedule

public final ScheduledTask schedule(SchedulerTask task,
                                    Quantum interval)
Schedules a new task to be executed with the given interval The newly scheduled task is exeucted out-of-order at the moment of scheduling it This operation's result should be cached by the caller;otherwise the task will get unscheduled immediately

Parameters:
task - The task to be executed
interval - The interval to execute the task
Returns:
Returns an instance of ScheduledTask that can be used to later modify the interval of execution

schedule

public final ScheduledTask schedule(SchedulerTask task,
                                    Quantum interval,
                                    boolean immediate)
Schedules a new task to be executed with the given interval This operation's result should be cached by the caller;otherwise the task will get unscheduled immediately

Parameters:
task - The task to be executed
interval - The interval to execute the task
immediate - Tells whether the newly scheduled task is exeucted out-of-order at the moment of scheduling it
Returns:
Returns an instance of ScheduledTask that can be used to later modify the interval of execution

unschedule

public final void unschedule(ScheduledTask task)
Unschedules an instance of Scheduled class

Parameters:
task - The task to be unscheduled
